scene_description_enriched: In a verdant landscape dotted with trees, a crowned figure kneels with hands clasped in prayer, looking upwards. Above, a divine figure, depicted as an elderly man with a beard, is surrounded by golden rays and holds a globe. To the right, an angel with red wings and a sword stands, gesturing towards the praying figure. In the background, a city with towers and walls is visible. The scene is framed by decorative borders.
scene_interpretation: The Visitation of the Angel to David
